text: Crown flower (Calotropis gigantea) is a species of plant. It is also known as Giant Milkweed. It belongs in the subfamily Asclepiadodeae. It is native to southeast Asia. It has been naturalized in Hawai'i. ==Other websites== *Calotropis gigantea at USDA PLANTS Database *Calotropis gigantea at Pacific Island Ecosystems at Risk *Calotropis gigantea at Purdue University: New Crop Resource Online Program Category:Apocynaceae
title: Calotropis gigantea
